_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Enshrouded FEX ARM64
author: 12860133+tsnz@users.noreply.github.com
description:
Enshrouded on ARM64 using FEX & Proton
Requires ports 15636 & 15637 by default.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# symlink home dir for installation
ln -s /mnt/server /home/container
export HOME=/home/container
cd $HOME

# install proton
/usr/local/bin/InstallProton.sh -t $PROTON_VERSION -d $HOME/proton
mkdir -p $STEAM_COMPAT_DATA_PATH

# download and extract a RootFS for FEX
[ -d $HOME/.fex-emu/RootFS ] && rm -rf $HOME/.fex-emu/RootFS
FEXRootFSFetcher -y -x --distro-name ubuntu --distro-version 24.04

# after setting up FEX, use it to set up SteamCMD and download the server files
/usr/local/bin/InstallSteamCMD.sh -d $STEAMCMD_PATH
FEX $STEAMCMD_PATH/steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir $HOME/server +login anonymous +app_update $APP_ID +quit

variables.name: Proton Repo API URL
variables.description: API URL for Proton GitHub repo

variables.name: Force Win Platform
variables.description: Force SteamCMD to download the Windows server files
